 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶ֫זֶם‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Job.42.11|Job 42:11]]</sup> ==ring==, always of gold when material mentioned; — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> absolute [[Gen.24.30|Gen 24:30]] +; construct v[[Gen.24.22|Gen 24:22]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִזְמָהּ‎</span> [[Hos.2.15|Hos 2:15]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְזָמִים‎</span>[[Gen.35.4|Gen 35:4]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִזְמֵי‎</span> [[Exod.32.2|Exod 32:2]] +; — 

**1.** ***nose-ring*** (Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) woman's ornament, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלאַֿפָּהּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Gen.24.47|Gen 24:47]] compare v[[Gen.24.22|Gen 24:22]] v[[Gen.24.30|Gen 24:30]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִזְמֵי הָאָף‎</span> [[Isa.3.21|Isa 3:21]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טַבַּ֫עַת‎</span> seal-ring); perhaps also [[Hos.2.15|Hos 2:15]]; [[Ezek.16.12|Ezek 16:12]] figurative of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s adorning Jerusalem (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲגִילִים עַלאָֿזְנַיִךְ‎</span>); compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּאַף חֲזִיר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Prov.11.22|Prov 11:22]]. 

**2.** ***earring*** ornament of men and women, [[Gen.35.4|Gen 35:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשֶׁר בְּאָזְנֵיהֶם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> so [[Exod.32.2|Exod 32:2]]; [[Exod.32.3|Exod 32:3]] (all [[BDB#E|E]]); compare [[Prov.25.12|Prov 25:12]] (in simile of wise reprover), and perhaps [[Exod.35.22|Exod 35:22]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טַבַּ֫עַת‎</span>); probably also [[Judg.8.24|Judg 8:24]] (twice in verse); [[Judg.8.25|Judg 8:25]]; [[Judg.8.26|Judg 8:26]] (of men, compare [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]), [[Job.42.11|Job 42:11]]. — compare further [[BDB#Gei|Gei]]<sup>Jüd. Zeltaschr. x (1872), 45 ff.</sup> [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Semitic i. 434, 2d ed. 453</sup>; also ref, below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נור‎</span>.
